channel.title: Help with the (How to start a server topic)
channel.description: Hey i am very sorry to bother you but i am in the progress of making my own server... and im stuck right here.. Downloading a source/base - because i downloaded one and tryed running it by clicking "runserver" and the command prompt came up saying that the server is already in use. any advice on what to do please it would be much appreciated. thanks in advance.

item.title: Help with the (How to start a server topic)
item.dc:creator: @djspanke djspanke
item.description:
@djspanke wrote:

i mean maybe another program is using port 43594? not any server

Read full topic
item.source: Help with the (How to start a server topic)

item.title: Help with the (How to start a server topic)
item.dc:creator: @God_of_Bow God_of_Bow
item.description:
@God_of_Bow wrote:

Ha sorry for all the confusion… but may it be because i have no router and haven’t done the port forwarding part yet? … also this is a server/client got from the part in the tutorial saying i need one … don’t they belong to people and arn’t they being used…? if they r downloaded? plus i don’t know how to post the picture because i can’t config it to the right size i have tried on numerous occasions.

Read full topic

it’s the port, not ip, something on your computer has the port 43594 open.

item.title: Help with the (How to start a server topic)
item.dc:creator: @rest_n_peace rest n peace
item.description:
@rest_n_peace wrote:

Step 1: Open client
Step 2:Click on File
Step 3: click on Change Server
Step 4:Type in: 0.0.0.0
Step 5: Press Ok
Step 6: try to login in

Read full topic
item.source: Help with the (How to start a server topic)
